definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[פּׂתֶה]] Pr 20:19 poss. one open as to lips, but v. [[פָּתָה]] denom. infr.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. juss. ´[[יַפְתְּ א]] [[לְיֶפֶת]] Ge 9:27 may God make wide for Japhet (give him an extensive inheritance).—Pf. poss. Pr 24:28 (reading [[וְהִפְתִּיתָ בִּשְׂפָתֶָיְ]], make wide with (open wide) thy lips, for MT ´[[יַהֲפִתִּיתָ בִּשׂ]], so SS ; but cf. [[פָּתָה]] denom.
